/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a car on the road, providing a driver's perspective of the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars and buses fill the road, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is hazy, casting a soft light over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
